subject: Brake Pedals
description_text:
Hi
I purchased "Simsonn Plus Pedal Upgrade Racing Simulator Professional
Pedals" from the official website and i'm using it to simulate road driving
not racing, so the brake pedals are hard to push and have short travel in
constant to real road cars.
So, is the soft White elastomer with 30HA available? or do you have another
idea?

Also there is noise "vibration"  interference in my brake pedal even if I
grounding it and turn off my steering wheel base.


the box type that i have:
[image: Screenshot 2025-08-20 132726.png]



Looking forward to hearing from you

Thanks

Mohamed Seyam

conversations.body_text: Hi M. Seyam,  You may try removing the 10mm spacer inside the black brake spring, which will restore the full travel of the spring. In addition, we recommend enabling the offset function to recalibrate the pedal, and then set the deadzone to around 5%.Â
